results.title: Arizona dream
results.creator_credit: Emir Kusturica, Claudie Ossard, Yves Marmion, Hachette Premiere, Constellation, Canal+ and CNC
results.brief_description:
Serbian born director Emir Kusturica’s first English language film is an absurdist comedy that focuses on the quirks of small town U.S. culture. Kusturica grafts his sometimes unwieldy Europe-inflected concerns onto brash American landscapes with mixed results. Johnny Depp stars as Axel, a young drifter caught between the dreams of youth and the responsibilities of adulthood. Enticed back to his Arizona hometown, the oddball residents take more than a passing interest in him. While his uncle Leo tries to convince him to take over the family’s cadillac dealership, Axel becomes caught up in a love triangle with a wealthy widow and her stepdaughter.
Cast also includes: Jerry Lewis, Faye Dunaway, Lili Taylor and Vincent Gallo.

results.title: Apollo 13
results.creator_credit: Ron Howard, Brian Grazer and Imagine Entertainment (US)
results.brief_description: Based on the book “Lost Moon” by astronaut Jim Lovell, Ron Howard’s film captures the tension and drama of the fated Apollo 13 mission. Less than a year after Neil Armstrong’s historic walk on the moon, the American people were losing interest in the mission. However when Apollo 13 blasted off and the words “Houston, we have a problem” filtered back, the world was on the edge of their seats as Mission Control worked around the clock to save the three astronauts. If you have ever wondered what it must be like to fly in space, “Apollo 13” provides a clear idea. A superb cast including Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Bill Paxton, Gary Sinise, Kathleen Quinlan and Ed Harris give excellent performances.

results.title: Antz
results.creator_credit: Tim Johnson, Eric Darnell, Patty Wooton, Aron Warner, Brad Lewis, PDI Group and NBCUniversal
results.brief_description: This dazzling computer animated comedy uses with great comic effect the neurotic persona of Woody Allen in order to tell the story of Z (Allen), a down trodden worker ant struggling to assert his individuality amongst the conformity of the ant colony. Z’s transformation from faceless nobody to unwilling hero eventuates when he volunteers to swap places with his fearless soldier ant buddy Weaver (Sylvester Stallone), in order to get close to the feisty Princess Bala (Sharon Stone). This lands the nervous insect right in the middle of the brutal termite wars and a series of misadventures, accumulating in the search for the mythical “Insectopia”. Directors Eric Darnell and Tim Johnson have a lot of fun by visually suggesting a microscopic world not unlike New York city and by giving the animated ants the physical traits and mannerisms of their voice-over counterparts. Gene Hackman, Dan Aykroyd, Jennifer Lopez, Danny Glover, Christopher Walken and Ann Bancroft are among the many who contribute their voices.

results.title: Annie Hall
results.creator_credit: Woody Allen, Charles H. Joffe and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: Woody Allen’s satire on the comic anxiety between the sexes in contemporary relationships. When Alvy Singer (Woody Allen), a neurotic night-club comedian, meets Annie Hall (Diane Keaton), a budding cabaret singer, a nervous romance begins. Also stars Colleen Dewhurst

results.title: Animal Crackers
results.brief_description: This is one of the Marx Brothers’ funniest films, with Groucho starring as the big, wild, game hunter causing more delirium in high society than in the jungle! A painting is stolen in a high society home, and the Marx Brothers are there to lend their confusing hand to solve the crime.

results.title: Andrei Rublev
results.brief_description: Widely regarded as Tarkovsky’s finest film, this film charts the life of the great icon painter through a turbulent period of 15th Century Russian history, a period marked by endless fighting between rival Princes and by Tartar invasions. Made on an epic scale, it does not flinch from portraying the savagery of the time, from which, almost inexplicably, the serenity of Rublev’s art arose. The great set-pieces - the sack of Vladimir, the casting of the bell, the pagan ceremonies of St. John’s Night and the Russian crucifixion are tours-de-force of visceral film making. This is the most complete version of the film available and reported to be the director’s cut. In Russian with English subtitles.

results.title: Andre
results.creator_credit: George Miller, Annette Handley, Adam Shapiro and Kushner-Locke Production
results.brief_description: Andre, an adorable seal is orphaned when his mother is caught in a fishing net. The harbour master, his wife and three children adopt the lovable pup and nurse him back to health. Andre forms a special relationship with seven year-old tomboy Toni and the two prove that true friendship can survive the toughest trials.

results.title: Andersonville
results.creator_credit: John Frankenheimer, David W. Rintels and Turner Pictures
results.brief_description: Andersonville was the notorious Confederate prison where Union soldiers were kept as prisoners of war. It is a place where men who once fought alongside each other now kill for the shirts off their backs. Sergeant McSpadden (Frederic Forrest) and Josiah Day (Jarrod Emick) lead a fearless band of men against the brutality of the most notorious prison of its time and the savagery of its inmates. Hunted like animals and tortured without mercy, they must trust in each other and be willing to sacrifice their own lives for the chance to escape. Frankenheimer creates a powerful portrayal of the struggle for freedom where the only law is the law of survival.

results.title: And the band played on
results.creator_credit: Roger Spottiswoode, Sarah Pillsbury, Midge Sanford, Home Box Office and Odyssey
results.brief_description: Based on Randy Shilts best-selling book which was drawn from a true story. The film exposes how the inaction and in-fighting amongst Government officials, blood banks, the scientific community and the general public contributed to the spreading of Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome and the general ignorance about the disease. The film will evoke anger and shock, but is ultimately moving. Starring Matthew Modine and an all-star cast of Alan Alda, Phil Collins, Richard Gere, Anjelica Huston, Steve Martin, Ian McKellen and Lily Tomlin.

results.title: An American tail: Fievel goes west
results.creator_credit: Simon Wells, Phil Nibbelink, Robert Watts, Steven Spielberg and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Fievel, the brave young mouse from the much loved “An American tail” returns in this Wild West adventure. Life is hard for the Mousekewitz family who struggle to make ends meet and to keep their dreams alive. Tanya wants to become a singer and Fievel wants to be like his hero Wylie Burp. Lured out West by crafty Cat R. Waul, Fievel uncovers a dastardly plot to turn new settlers into mouse burgers. With the help of his cat friend Tiger and the feared Wylie Burp, Fievel saves the day. Features the voices of James Stewart, John Cleese, Dom DeLuise and Amy Irving with Linda Ronstadt singing the song “Dreams to Dream”.
